Package org.apache.pivot.wtk.content

Contains classes representing component data, such as list items or table rows.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AccordionHeaderDataRenderer Default accordion header data renderer.
ButtonData Default button data implementation.
ButtonDataRenderer Default button data renderer.
CalendarButtonDataRenderer Default calendar button data renderer.
CalendarDateSpinnerData Spinner data model that presents a bounded list of calendar dates.
ColorItem List item representing a color.
LinkButtonDataRenderer Default link button data renderer.
ListButtonColorItemRenderer List button renderer for displaying color swatches.
ListButtonDataRenderer Default list button data renderer.
ListItem Default list item implementation.
ListViewColorItemRenderer List view renderer for displaying color swatches.
ListViewColorItemRenderer.ColorBadge Internal image class for rendering color swatches.
ListViewItemEditor Default list view item editor.
ListViewItemRenderer Default list view item renderer.
MenuBarItemDataRenderer Default menu bar item data renderer.
MenuButtonDataRenderer Default menu button data renderer.
MenuItemData Default menu item data implementation.
MenuItemDataRenderer Default menu item data renderer.
NumericSpinnerData Spinner data model that presents a bounded list of integers.
SpinnerItemRenderer Default spinner item renderer, which renders all items as strings by calling toString() on them.
TableViewBooleanCellRenderer Default renderer for table view cells that contain boolean data.
TableViewCellRenderer Default table cell renderer.
TableViewCheckboxCellRenderer Default renderer for table view cells that contain boolean data.
TableViewDateCellRenderer Default renderer for table view cells that contain date data.
TableViewFileSizeCellRenderer Default renderer for table view cells that contain file size data.
TableViewHeaderData Default table header data implementation.
TableViewHeaderDataRenderer Default table view header data renderer.
TableViewImageCellRenderer Default renderer for table view cells that contain image data.
TableViewMultiCellRenderer Table cell renderer that supports dynamic rendering based on the type of content being rendered.
TableViewMultiCellRenderer.RendererMapping Maps the type of value being rendered (the value class) to a specific cell renderer.
TableViewNumberCellRenderer Default renderer for table view cells that contain numeric data.
TableViewRowComparator Compares two rows in a table view.
TableViewRowEditor Default table view row editor.
TableViewTextAreaCellRenderer Renders cell contents as a string using a text area (which supports line feeds, which the default label-based table view cell renderer does not).
TableViewTriStateCellRenderer Default renderer for table view cells that contain tri-state data.
TreeBranch Default tree branch implementation.
TreeNode Default tree node implementation.
TreeViewNodeEditor Default tree view node editor.
TreeViewNodeRenderer Default tree node renderer, which knows how to render instances of TreeNode and Image.
 

Package org.apache.pivot.wtk.content Description

Contains classes representing component data, such as list items or table rows.
